title: Tiled Time
summary: Interactive, animatable watch face with clean, minimalistic and refined design.
description: Watch face offers 19 interactive themes, which will look great on both round and square watches.3 ambient modes from minimal to full color.Includes 4 widgets: date, weather, calendar, heart rate + stripe bar to show battery level.Date widget: ✓ Day✓ Day of week✓ Month✓ Week✓ Moon phaseWeather widget: ✓ Temperature✓ Wind speed✓ Atmospheric pressure✓ Humidity✓ Sunrise time✓ Sunset timeCalendar:✓ Current month with highlighted current day✓ Next two monthsHeart Rate:✓ 10 seconds update✓ Always on screen✓ Configurable heart rate zone with notifications for better workout
descriptionHTML:
Watch face offers 19 interactive themes, which will look great on both round and square watches.
3 ambient modes from minimal to full color.
Includes 4 widgets: date, weather, calendar, heart rate + stripe bar to show battery level.

Date widget:

✓ Day
✓ Day of week
✓ Month
✓ Week
✓ Moon phase

Weather widget:

✓ Temperature
✓ Wind speed
✓ Atmospheric pressure
✓ Humidity
✓ Sunrise time
✓ Sunset time

Calendar:

✓ Current month with highlighted current day
✓ Next two months

Heart Rate:

✓ 10 seconds update
✓ Always on screen
✓ Configurable heart rate zone with notifications for better workout
comments: Like the designs, really love the  transition from one theme to another; not only is it easy, the effect is very very cool. My only suggestion, or request, would be a little more color control.
12 hour mode doesn't work at noon. It shows 0:30 instead of 12:30 PM
